question: Carlton Chapman, who passed away recently, is associated with which sports?
explanation:
Carlton Chapman, the former Indian foot ball player, passed away recently. He was 49 years old.
Carlton Chapman led the Indian menâ€™s football team in the 1990s and has played for India from 1990 to 2001. He was part of the winning team of 1997 South Asian Football Federation Gold Cup. He is known for a hat trick scored for the Kolkata club.
